function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for online retail operations","Impact":"Overwhelmed supply chain, potential delays in delivery, increased risk of exposure for workers","Mitigation":"Implement efficient inventory management systems, expand delivery capacity, stagger work schedules, enforce social distancing measures","Technologies":"Inventory management software, delivery optimization tools, remote work collaboration platforms","People":"Retail workers, delivery personnel, and customers","Owner":"Retailers, delivery companies, and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Shift towards online shopping and cashless transactions","Impact":"Increased cyber security risks, potential data breaches, greater dependence on technology, exclusion of individuals without access to digital payment methods","Mitigation":"Implement robust cyber security measures, provide digital inclusion initiatives, diversify payment methods, educate customers on online safety","Technologies":"Encryption solutions, biometric authentication, digital payment platforms, customer data protection tools","People":"Bank customers, online shoppers, and individuals without digital payment access","Owner":"Banks, online retailers, and government digital inclusion programs"}]}
